description: Time to choose your fighter? Steam's Fighting Games Fest is now live and will run through July 22nd so you can get some delicious discounts.
title: Get ready to beat 'em up in Steam's Fighting Games Fest that's now live

description: Inspired by the Strike series (Desert/Jungle/Urban Strike) and Choplifter, Megacopter: Blades of the Goddess is a lot of fun if you love fast-paced shoot 'em up action.
title: Megacopter: Blades of the Goddess is a quality shoot 'em up throwback to Desert Strike

description: Another round of games have gone through Valve's official testing for Steam Deck, so here's a fresh mid-July round-up of Steam Deck Verified games for you to begin your week with.
title: Here's more of the latest Steam Deck Verified games including Sea of Thieves

description: On top of fixing up various issues with Stardew Valley modding, the new Alpha of the cross-platform and open source Nexus Mods app introduces experimental Cyberpunk 2077 support.
title: Nexus Mods new cross-platform app adds experimental Cyberpunk 2077 support

description: A little later than they usually put out a release, the Wine 9.13 update is out now bringing more new features and bug fixes to bring better Windows compatibility to Linux.
title: Wine 9.13 brings more CMD.EXE engine rewrites, supports loading ODBC Windows drivers

description: Linus Torvalds announced the release of Linux kernel 6.10 and with it, plenty of new hardware support and improvements to existing hardware. You know the drill.
title: Linux kernel 6.10 is out now

description: Here's your chance to play a platform fighter that's a bit different, and help shape its development with Counterpick Labs now in Early Access from developer UrbanMotmot.
title: Free to play customizable platform fighter Counterpick Labs is out in Early Access

description: Developer NikkiJay recently revealed Quantum Witch, a rather quirky sounding mix of game genres that blends a platformer with a sort-of choose your adventure style.
title: Check out Quantum Witch, a platformer meets point and click choose your adventure

description: The team is excited to present the new version of the fheroes2 engine - 1.1.1 for Heroes of Might and Magic II after more than a month of hard work.
title: Heroes of Might and Magic II game engine fheroes2 v1.1.1 released
